title: The Incidental Inheritance
description: Evan and Beca Brady thought they had the next ten years of their lives all planned. Hard work and long hours led them closer to their goals. They gradually added to the nest egg that would afford them children, a bigger house, and a bright future.An astonishing family tragedy changed everything.Little did they know the extravagant inheritance that awaited them, would present shocking truths and ultimately come at a dangerous price.
author: B.L. Hoffman
